nodes.text: Speeder A23 was the designation of a landspeeder assigned to the Imperial garrison on the planet Rhamalai. During an escape attempt using falsified orders to depart the garrison, Denel Moonrunner, Nadra Enasteri and Charis Enasteri were directed to use Speeder A23. However, they took a speeder closer to them due to Charis' medical condition.
